settings.title: What is the material of FluidX pants?
settings.content: FluidX pants are crafted from 100% polyester, specifically designed for optimal performance and comfort. The innovative CiEM fabric ensures breathability, durability, and flexibility, making it ideal for various activities.

settings.title: How does FluidX pants fit?
settings.content: FluidX pants are designed to provide a modern, comfortable fit. They offer a balance of flexibility and structure, allowing for unrestricted movement while maintaining a polished appearance. We recommend choosing your regular pant size for the best fit.

settings.title: Are FluidX pants machine washable?
settings.content: Yes, FluidX pants are machine washable. For optimal care, we recommend washing them at 30Â°C. To preserve the fabric's quality, it's advisable to wash dark colors separately and avoid using bleach.

settings.title: Do FluidX pants have pockets?
settings.content: Absolutely! FluidX pants feature a thoughtfully designed, secure mobile pocket to keep your essentials within easy reach. This pocket is strategically placed for convenience and style.

settings.title: What colors are FluidX pants available in?
settings.content: FluidX pants come in a range of six versatile colors to suit every style and occasion- ash, camel, cocoa brown, midnight, granite green and infinity. From classic options like black pants and blue pants to trendy shades like green pants, there's a perfect color for everyone. Our color palette is carefully curated to ensure both style and functionality.

settings.title: What is the technology used in FluidX pants
settings.content: FluidX technology incorporates innovative CiEM fabric that intelligently adapts to your body's temperature. This fabric efficiently wicks away moisture, keeping you cool and dry, while also offering exceptional breathability. The result is unparalleled comfort throughout the day. This makes FluidX the best formal pants for men.

settings.title: Are FluidX pants suitable for both casual wear and formal wear?
settings.content: Yes, FluidX pants are incredibly versatile. Their modern design and comfortable fit make them suitable for a wide range of occasions, from casual outings to office settings. You can effortlessly dress them up or down to match your desired style.

settings.title: How is FluidX better than other wrinkle-free pants?
settings.content: FluidX pants stand out from the competition due to their advanced CiEM fabric technology. Unlike traditional wrinkle-free pants, FluidX offers superior stretch, breathability, and moisture-wicking properties. This combination ensures exceptional comfort and performance, making them the ideal choice for a modern lifestyle.
